root.name: LEGO Legends of Chima: Laval's Journey
root.description: OverviewLEGO Legends of Chima: Laval's Journey is a game based on the LEGO 2013 Legends of Chima line, made by TT Games for the 3DS, DS and Vita. The 3DS and Vita versions are due out summer 2013, with the DS one following in the fall.
